name: Hinori
description:
This is a short visual novel about Hinori, a depressed thrift store worker who also happens to be a friend of yours! 

// There is depictions of light anxiety and mentions of depressive thoughts, if you're sensitive to this please be cautious //

I taught myself how to program in ren py in about 2 hours (wrote it as I learned) and drew this in less so I am definitely not the greatest programmer, let me know if anything goes awry.

This is my submission to the O2A2 jam! Please check it out, there are other cool visual novels there >:]
